pages.disclaimers: Aurora Hotel Disclaimers - Understand Terms of Use for Luxury and Excitement Aurora Hotel HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Important Information Please review the following information before booking your stay at Aurora Hotel. Information Accuracy: Aurora Hotel strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information on its website and promotional materials. However, we do not guarantee the completeness or infallibility of such information. We reserve the right to modify information at any time without prior notice. External Links: Our website may contain links to external websites operated by third parties. Aurora Hotel is not responsible for the content or practices of these websites. We recommend you review the privacy policies and terms of use of any external website you visit. Rates and Availability: Rates and availability of rooms and services are subject to change without notice. Please confirm all pricing and availability at the time of booking. Images and Descriptions: Images and descriptions of hotel facilities and amenities are for illustrative purposes only and may not reflect the exact appearance or configuration of rooms or services. Amenities and services may vary depending on the room type or package booked. Guest Conduct: Guests are expected to comply with all hotel policies and regulations, including those related to noise levels, smoking restrictions, and occupancy limits. Aurora Hotel reserves the right to terminate a guest's stay for violation of these policies. Limitation of Liability: Aurora Hotel shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use of this website or your stay at the hotel, except to the extent mandated by law. By making a reservation at Aurora Hotel, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this disclaimer. The Aurora Hotel website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. pages.privacy-policy: Aurora Hotel & Casino Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Personal Information TabTrove HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy Your Privacy Matters to Us Welcome to Aurora Hotel. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (the "Site"). Please read this policy carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it. Larger Hotel Group: The hotel might be part of a bigger hotel group with a group-wide privacy policy. Try searching the website of a larger hotel group that owns Aurora Hotel and Casino. Look for a link to the "privacy policy" or "data protection" section. No Formal Policy: It's possible Aurora Hotel and Casino doesn't have a formal privacy policy yet. But they should still comply with data privacy laws and regulations. Contact the hotel directly; they might provide details on how they handle your data. Here are some additional tips for finding a hotel's privacy policy: Footer Check: Look for a link to the privacy policy in the footer of the hotel's website. Website Search: Search the hotel's website for terms like "privacy policy" or "data protection" using the search function on most websites. Contact the Hotel: If all else fails, contact Aurora Hotel and Casino directly. They should be able to answer your questions about data handling practices.
